clinical_study.brief_title: Phase 2 Study of ABX-EGF (Panitumumab) in Japanese Subjects With M-colorectal Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 2 Multicenter Single Arm Clinical Trial of ABX EGF (Panitumumab) Monotherapy in Japanese Subjects With Metastatic Colorectal Cancer Who Developed Progressive Disease or Relapsed While on or After Prior Fluoropyrimidine, Irinotecan and Oxaliplatin Chemotherapy

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective of this study is to assess the effect of treatment with ABX-EGF on best overall objective response rate by modified RECIST (confirmed complete or partial response) in Japanese subjects with metastatic colorectal cancer.

results_reference.citation: Muro K, Yoshino T, Doi T, Shirao K, Takiuchi H, Hamamoto Y, Watanabe H, Yang BB, Asahi D. A phase 2 clinical trial of panitumumab monotherapy in Japanese patients with metastatic colorectal cancer. Jpn J Clin Oncol. 2009 May;39(5):321-6. doi: 10.1093/jjco/hyp016. Epub 2009 Mar 14.
